about_the_game:
A scorching package of 102 professional-quality sound effects for flames, fire ambience, fire magic and more.

Includes:

* OGG and M4a file formats
* Ambiences: bonfires, fireplace in different environments, forest burning, lava, etc...
* Coal
* Fireworks
* Lighter sounds
* Wood burning
* Fire Spells & attacks
* And more...

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games

detailed_description:
A scorching package of 102 professional-quality sound effects for flames, fire ambience, fire magic and more.

Includes:

* OGG and M4a file formats
* Ambiences: bonfires, fireplace in different environments, forest burning, lava, etc...
* Coal
* Fireworks
* Lighter sounds
* Wood burning
* Fire Spells & attacks
* And more...

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
